attributes.action: Hook up the national grid to the crematoriums
attributes.additional_details:
Large amounts of energy are lost each time a person is cremated and the crematoriums continually run.
I propose that we link the national grid to the crematoriums and harvest some of this energy. With a simple switch It could remain the choice of the individual as to wether they would wish to be fed to the grid ,those willing should be given a discount from their funeral expenses.
